p: In such cases, with the onset of chikungunya fever, along with the medicines which control fever, anti-inflammatory drugs like Nirgundi (Vitex negundo Linn.), Shallaki ( Boswellia serrata Roxb.), or Guggulu ( Commiphora wightii Arn.) can be started so that only few of the cases actually turn up as a case of post-chikungunya chronic inflammatory rheumatism. Similarly, dengue fever usually causes rapid decrease in platelet count and lasts with prolonged debility. In these cases of dengue, along with the antipyrexial drugs, drugs that promote hematopoiesis especially help in the platelet formation can be added.
